name: Awesome Paper Toys
description:
"10/10 – Our jaw dropped" – musthaveapps

Grab scissors and glue and craft real, working, awesome paper toys!
From the makers of Tiny Paper Zoo comes the second papercraft app for iPhone and iPad.
No In-App-Purchase. All toys are already included.

Each toy has a special feature, such as flying, catapulting, moving, animating, ...
3 difficulties from 5 minutes to one hour of crafting.
Print the instructions or trace them through a piece of paper on the iPad. Follow the instructions on the screen and craft 9 different paper toys with all kinds of features.
